summary: The diff implements a client-side shim calculator page with a quantity table, hardcoded 13-color thickness mapping, running total in mm, and a warm (non blue/purple-dominant) theme. It also adds unrequested Internet Identity/react-query actor wiring and a stub Motoko backend actor.

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity authentication context/provider and related identity/actor hooks (React Query + actor creation).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly lists user accounts/login as a non-goal and does not require introducing authentication for this calculator UI.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a Motoko backend canister stub (single actor) despite no backend work being required.
hallucinated_features.reason: The request is frontend-only; backend work is stated as 'not required for this request'.

hallucinated_features.description: Footer attribution link to caffeine.ai with dynamic hostname UTM parameters.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by any requirement and unrelated to the shim calculator functionality/theme requirements.
